name: specialist-added.toml

event.name: Specialist Added
event.description: Admin added a new specialist to the system

payload.name: serviceTypes
payload.description: List of services specialist can provide

backend.description: Creates specialist record, generates login credentials, sends welcome SMS with app download link

rawContent:
[event]
id = "specialist.added"
name = "Specialist Added"
description = "Admin added a new specialist to the system"
category = "specialist"

[trigger]
action = "click"
element = "Add Specialist button in dialog"

[[payload]]
name = "name"
type = "string"
description = "Specialist full name"

[[payload]]
name = "phone"
type = "string"
description = "Specialist phone number"

[[payload]]
name = "email"
type = "string"
description = "Specialist email"

[[payload]]
name = "serviceTypes"
type = "array"
description = "List of services specialist can provide"

[[payload]]
name = "cities"
type = "array"
description = "Cities where specialist can work"

[backend]
description = "Creates specialist record, generates login credentials, sends welcome SMS with app download link"

[relations]
entities = ["specialist"]
routes = ["admin-specialists"]
